findings.title: CR - Code Repetition
findings.description: The contract contains repetitive code segments that can lead to issues like gas efficiency, complexity, readability, security, and maintainability of the source code.

findings.title: PAV - Pair Address Validation
findings.description: The contract is missing address validation in the pair address argument, which can introduce security risks and potential attacks.

findings.title: MEM - Misleading Error Messages
findings.description: The contract is using misleading error messages that do not accurately reflect the problem, making it difficult to identify and fix the issue.

findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead, and increases gas consumption unnecessarily.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity naming conventions, which can impact code readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables that have been configured with user-supplied input without proper checks for zero values.
